{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=Meraki MX60 |revision=W |upc=810979011309 |asin=B00CHHXS0S |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=EoL (10/24/2022) |price=845 |est_release_date=10/2012 |fcc_date=04/13/2012 |fcc_id=UDX-60016015 |ic_id=6961A-60016015 |pcb_id=7016A0512008 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Applied Micro |cpu1_model=APM82181 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=1 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9K8G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU128M8GE-AC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327;AR8327-BL1A; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;SiGe (Skyworks);SE2595L;;3;,,, PCI Gen 2 Frequency Generator for CPU;IDT;ICS9FG104D;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Fitipower;FP6137E;;1;,,, 2A Dual Output Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;TI;TPS54286;;1;,,, 5A Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AOZ1094AI;;1;,,, 16V/4A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8708EN;;1;,,, Low Voltage Hex Inverter w/ 5V Tolerant Schmitt Trigger Inputs;Fairchild;74LCX14;;1; |flags=metal case, heatsink, MIMO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.08; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.109 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=00:01:73, 88:DC:96 |oui_eth=00:01:73, 00:18:0A }} :[http://www.meraki.com/products/appliances/mx60w Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://meraki.cisco.com/lib/pdf/meraki_setup_MX60.pdf Hardware Installation Guide]
"7016A0512008" and "Rev:1.00" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Senao]] (see also [[Meraki MX60]])
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/meraki/mx60 ''Meraki MX60W'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.thesecurityblogger.com/meraki-mx60-mx60w-security-appliance-first-look/ ''Meraki MX60 / MX60W Security Appliance First Look'' on '''The Security Blogger''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Applied Micro]] APM82181 @800MHz :PowerPC 464 SoC *Storage: 1GB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: 512MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9380 :Dual-band 802.11abgn 2.4/5GHz *Network: 5x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 12V 1.5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Meraki MX60W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Meraki MX60W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
